ayas.text: tanzīlul kitābi minallāhil `azīzil ḥakīm
innā anzalnā ilaykal kitāba bil ḥaqqi fa`budillāha mukhliṣal lahud dīn

alā lillāhid dīnul khāliṣ ۚ wal ladhīnat-takhadhū min dūnihi awliyā-a mā na`buduhum illā liyuqarribūnā ilallāhi zulfā innallāha yaḥkumu baynahum fī mā hum fīhi yakhtalifūn ۗ innallāha lā yahdī man huwa kādhibun kaffār
law arādallāhu an yattakhidha waladal laṣṭafā mimmā yakhluqu mā yashā-u ۚ subḥānah ۖ huwallāhul wāḥidul qahhār
khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqq ۖ yukawwirul layla `alan nahāri wayukawwirun nahāra `alal layl ۖ wasakhharash shamsa wal qamar ۖ kullun yajrī li-ajalin musammā ۗ alā huwal `azīzul ghaffār

khalaqakum min nafsin wāḥidatin thumma ja`ala minhā zawjahā wa-anzala lakum minal-an`āmi thamāniyata azwāj ۚ yakhluqukum fī buṭūni ummahātikum khalqan min ba`di khalqin fī ẓulumātin thalāth ۚ dhālikumullāhu rabbukum lahul mulk ۖ lā ilāha illā huw ۖ fa-annā tuṣrafūn

in takfurū fa-innallāha ghaniyyun `ankum ۖ walā yarḍā li`ibādihil kufr ۖ wa in tashkurū yarḍahu lakum ۗ walā taziru wāziratun wizra ukhrā ۗ thumma ilā rabbikum marji`ukum fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn ۚ innahu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

wa idhā massal-insāna ḍurrun da`ā rabbahu munīban ilayhi thumma idhā khawwalahu ni`matan minhu nasiya mā kāna yad`ū ilayhi min qablu waja`ala lillāhi andādal liyuḍilla `an sabīlih ۚ qul tamatta` bikufrika qalīlā ۖ innaka min aṣ-ḥābin nār
amman huwa qānitun ānā-al layli sājidan waqā-iman yaḥdharul-ākhirata wayarjū raḥmata rabbih ۗ qul hal yastawil ladhīna ya`lamūna wal ladhīna lā ya`lamūn ۗ innamā yatadhakkaru ulul-albāb
qul yā`ibādil ladhīna āmanut-taqū rabbakum ۚ lilladhīna aḥsanū fī hādhihid dunyā ḥasanah ۗ wa-arḍullāhi wāsi`ah ۗ innamā yuwaffaṣ ṣābirūna ajrahum bighayri ḥisāb
qul innī umirtu an a`budallāha mukhliṣal lahud dīn
wa-umirtu li-an akūna awwalal-muslimīn
qul innī akhāfu in `aṣaytu rabbī `adhāba yawmin `aẓīm
qulillāha a`budu mukhliṣal lahu dīnī
fa`budū mā shi-tum min dūnih ۗ qul innal khāsirīnal ladhīna khasirū anfusahum wa-ahlīhim yawmal qiyāmah ۗ alā dhālika huwal khusrānul mubīn
lahum min fawqihim ẓulalun minan nāri wa min taḥtihim ẓulal ۚ dhālika yukhawwifullāhu bihi `ibādah ۚ yā`ibādi fattaqūn
wal ladhīnaj-tanabuṭ ṭāghūta an ya`budūhā wa-anābū ilallāhi lahumul bushrā ۚ fabashhir `ibād
alladhīna yastami`ūnal qawla fayattabi`ūna aḥsanah ۚ ulā-ikal ladhīna hadāhumullāh ۖ wa-ulā-ika hum ulul-albāb
afaman ḥaqqa `alayhi kalimatul `adhābi afa-anta tunqidhu man fin nār
lākinil ladhīnat-taqaw rabbahum lahum ghurafun min fawqihā ghurafun mabniyyatun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۖ wa`dallāh ۖ lā yukhlifullāhul mī`ād

alam tara annallāha anzala minas samā-i mā-an fasalakahu yanābī`a fil-arḍi thumma yukhriju bihi zar`an mukhtalifan alwānuhu thumma yahīju fatarāhu muṣfarran thumma yaj`aluhu ḥuṭāmā ۚ inna fī dhālika ladhikrā li-ulil-albāb
afaman sharaḥallāhu ṣadrahu lilislāmi fahuwa `alā nūrin min rabbih ۚ fawaylul lilqāsiyati qulūbuhum min dhikrillāh ۚ ulā-ika fī ḍalālin mubīn

allāhu nazzala aḥsanal ḥadīthi kitāban mutashābihan mathāniya taqsha`irru minhu julūdul ladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum thumma talīnu julūduhum waqulūbuhum ilā dhikrillāh ۚ dhālika hudallāhi yahdī bihi man yashā-u ۚ wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min hād
afaman yattaqī biwajhihi sū al `adhābi yawmal qiyāmah ۚ waqīla liẓẓālimīna dhūqū mā kuntum taksibūn
kadhhabal ladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumul `adhābu min ḥaythu lā yash`urūn
fa-adhāqahumullāhul khizya fil ḥayātid dunyā ۖ wala`adhābul-ākhirati akbar ۚ law kānū ya`lamūn
walaqad ḍarabnā linnāsi fī hādhal qur-āni min kulli mathalin la`allahum yatadhakkarūn
qur-ānan `arabiyyan ghayra dhī `iwajin la`allahum yattaqūn
ḍaraballāhu mathalan rajulan fīhi shurakā-u mutashākisūna warajulan salamal lirajulin hal yastawiyāni mathalā ۚ al-ḥamdu lillāh ۚ bal aktharuhum lā ya`lamūn
innaka mayyitun wa innahum mayyitūn
thumma innakum yawmal qiyāmati `inda rabbikum takhtaṣimūn
faman aẓlamu mimman kadhaba `alallāhi wakadhhaba biṣ ṣidqi idh jā-ah ۚ alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lilkāfirīn
wal ladhī jā-a biṣ ṣidqi waṣaddaqa bihi ulā-ika humul muttaqūn
lahum mā yashā-ūna `inda rabbihim ۚ dhālika jazā-ul muḥsinīn
liyukaffirallāhu `anhum aswa-al ladhī `amilū wayajziyahum ajrahum bi-aḥsanil ladhī kānū ya`malūn
alaysallāhu bikāfin `abdah ۖ wayukhawwifūnaka bil ladhīna min dūnih ۚ wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min hād
wa man yahdillāhu famā lahu min muḍill ۗ alaysallāhu bi`azīzin dhin-tiqām

wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunnallāh ۚ qul afara aytum mā tad`ūna min dūnillāhi in arādaniyallāhu biḍurrin hal hunna kāshifātu ḍurrihi aw arādanī biraḥmatin hal hunna mumsikātu raḥmatih ۚ qul ḥasbiyallāh ۖ `alayhi yatawakkalul mutawakkilūn
qul yāqawmi'-malū `alā makānatikum innī `āmil ۖ fasawfa ta`lamūn
man ya-tīhi `adhābun yukhzīhi wayaḥillu `alayhi `adhābun muqīm
innā anzalnā `alaykal kitāba linnāsi bil ḥaqq ۖ famanih-tadā falinafsih ۖ wa man ḍalla fa-innamā yaḍillu `alayhā ۖ wa mā anta `alayhim biwakīl
allāhu yatawaffal-anfusa ḥīna mawtihā wal latī lam tamut fī manāmihā ۖ fayumsikul latī qaḍā `alayhal mawta wayursilul-ukhrā ilā ajalin musammā ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yatafakkarūn
amit-takhadhū min dūnillāhi shufa`ā-a ۚ qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shay-an walā ya`qilūn
qul lillāhish shafā`atu jamī`ā ۖ lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ thumma ilayhi turja`ūn
wa idhā dhukirallāhu waḥdahush-ma-azzat qulūbul ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirah ۖ wa idhā dhukiral ladhīna min dūnihi idhā hum yastabshirūn
qulillāhumma fāṭiras samāwāti wal-arḍi `ālimal ghaybi wash shahādati anta taḥkumu bayna `ibādika fī mā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn
walaw anna lilladhīna ẓalamū mā fil-arḍi jamī`an wa mithlahu ma`ahu laftadaw bihi min sū-il `adhābi yawmal qiyāmah ۚ wabadā lahum minallāhi mā lam yakūnū yaḥtasibūn
wabadā lahum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn
fa-idhā massal-insāna ḍurrun da`ānā thumma idhā khawwalnāhu ni`matan minnā qāla innamā ūtītuhu `alā `il-m ۚ bal hiya fitnatun walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn
qad qālahal ladhīna min qablihim famā aghnā `anhum mā kānū yaksibūn
fa-aṣābahum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū ۚ wal ladhīna ẓalamū min hā-ulā-i sayuṣībuhum sayyi-ātu mā kasabū wa mā hum bimu`jizīn
awalam ya`lamū annallāha yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u wayaqdir ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yu-minūn
qul yā`ibādiyal ladhīna asrafū `alā anfusihim lā taqnaṭū min raḥmatil lāh ۚ innallāha yaghfirudh dhunūba jamī`ā ۚ innahu huwal ghafūrur raḥīm
wa-anībū ilā rabbikum wa-aslimū lahu min qabli an ya-tiyakumul `adhābu thumma lā tunṣarūn
wattabi`ū aḥsana mā unzila ilaykum min rabbikum min qabli an ya-tiyakumul `adhābu baghtatan wa-antum lā tash`urūn
an taqūla nafsun yāḥasratā `alā mā farraṭtu fī janbillāhi wa in kuntu laminas sākhirīn
aw taqūla law annallāha hadānī lakuntu minal muttaqīn
aw taqūla ḥīna taral `adhāba law anna lī karratan fa-akūna minal muḥsinīn
balā qad jā-at ka āyātī fakadhhabta bihā wastakbarta wakunta minal kāfirīn
wayawmal qiyāmati taral ladhīna kadhabū `alallāhi wujūhuhum muswaddah ۚ alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lil-mutakabbirīn
wayunajjillāhul ladhīnat-taqaw bimafāzatihim lā yamassuhumus sū-u walā hum yaḥzanūn
allāhu khāliqu kulli shay-ī ۖ wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in wakīl
lahu maqālīdus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۗ wal ladhīna kafarū bi-āyātillāhi ulā-ika humul khāsirūn
qul afaghayrallāhi ta-murūnnī a`budu ayyuhal jāhilūn
walaqad ūḥiya ilayka wa ilal ladhīna min qablika la-in ashrakta layaḥbaṭanna `amaluka walatakūnanna minal khāsirīn
balillāha fa`bud wakun minash shākirīn
wa mā qadarullāha ḥaqqa qadrihi wal-arḍu jamī`an qabḍatuhu yawmal qiyāmati was samāwātu maṭwiyyātun biyamīnih ۚ subḥānahu wata`ālā `ammā yushrikūn
wanufikha fiṣ ṣūri faṣa`iqa man fis samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi illā man shā-allāh ۖ thumma nufikha fīhi ukhrā fa-idhā hum qiyāmun yanẓurūn
wa-ashraqatil-arḍu binūri rabbihā wawuḍi`al kitābu wajī-a bin nabiyyīna wash shuhadā-i waquḍiya baynahum bil ḥaqqi wahum lā yuẓlamūn
wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā `amilat wahuwa a`lamu bimā yaf`alūn

wasīqal ladhīna kafarū ilā jahannama zumarā ۖ ḥattā idhā jā-ūhā futiḥat abwābuhā waqāla lahum khazanatuhā alam ya-tikum rusulun minkum yatlūna `alaykum āyāti rabbikum wayundhirūnakum liqā-a yawmikum hādhā ۚ qālū balā walākin ḥaqqat kalimatul `adhābi `alal-kāfirīn
qīlad-khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā ۖ fabi-sa mathwal mutakabbirīn
wasīqal ladhīnat-taqaw rabbahum ilal-jannati zumarā ۖ ḥattā idhā jā-ūhā wafutiḥat abwābuhā waqāla lahum khazanatuhā salāmun `alaykum ṭibtum fadkhulūhā khālidīn
waqālul ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī ṣadaqanā wa`dahu wa-awrathanal-arḍa natabawwa-u minal jannati ḥaythu nashā-u ۖ fani`ma ajrul `āmilīn
wataral malā-ikata ḥāffīna min ḥawlil `arshi yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim ۖ waquḍiya baynahum bil ḥaqqi waqīlal-ḥamdu lillāhi rabbil `ālamīn
